term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - pulse amplitude analyser
term.title: pulse amplitude analyser

item.text: A sub-assembly for determining the distribution function of a set of pulses in terms of their amplitude. Synonymous with pulse height analyser.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1548 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
